sections.text: agnEH kRuttikAH|̍ śukraM parastAq-jjyOti-ravastA̱t|̍ | prajApatE̍ rOhiṇI| ApaH̍ parastAqdOśhadhayO̍ &vastA̱t| | sOmasyEnvakA̍ vitatAni|̍ parastAqdvayantO̍ &vastA̱t| | rudrasya# bAqhU| mRugayavaH̍ parastA̱dvikśhAqrO&vastA̱t|̍ | adityai̍ punarvasU|̍ vAtaH̍ parastAdAqrdra-mavastA̱t|̍ | 1 (10)

bRuhaspatE̱stiśhyaH|̍ juhvataH̍ parastAqd-yajamAnA̍ avastA̱t| | sarpAṇA-mAśrEśhAH|̍ aByAqgacCantaH̍ parastAdaByAqnRutya̍ntO&vastA̱t|̍ | pitRuṇAM maGAH| rudantaH̍ parastAdapaBraṃqśO̍&vastA̱t|̍ | aryamṇaH pUrvE PalgunI|̍ jAqyA parastAdRuśhaBO̍&vastA̱t|̍ | BagasyOttarE|̍ vahatavaH̍ parastAqdvahamAnA̍ avastA̱t| | 2 (10)

dEvasya# savituṛ hastaH|̍ prasavaH parastA̱th-saqniravastA̱t| | indrasya̍ citrA| RutaM parastA̱th-satya-mavastA̱t| | vAqyOr-niśhTyA̱ vratatiH|̍ parastAq-dasiddhi-ravastA̱t|̍ | indrAqgniyOr viśAKE|̍ yugAni# parastA̱t-kRuśhamAṇA̍ avastA̱t| | mitrasyA-nUrAqdhAH|̍ aByAqrOhat-parastA̍-daByArU̍Dha-mavastA̱t|̍ | 3 (10)

indrasya̍ rOhiṇI| śRuṇat-parastA̱t-pratiśRuṇa-davastA̱t| | niṛ Rutyai-mUlavaṛ̍ haṇI|̍ pratiBa~jjantaH̍ parastA̱t-pratiśRuṇantO&vastA̱t| | apAM pUrvA# aśhAqDhAH| varcaH̍ parastAqth-samiti-ravastA̱t|̍ | viśvEśhAM̍ dEvAnAq-muttarAH|̍ aBijayat-parastA̍-daBiji̍ta-mavastA̱t|̍ | viśhṇO̱H śrOṇA pRucCamAnAH|̍ parastAqt-panthA# avastA̱t| | 4 (10)

vasUnAqṅq̍ śraviśhThAH|̍ BUtaM parastAqd-BUtiravastA̱t|̍ | indrasya-śataBi̍śhak|̍ viśvavyacAH̍ parastA̱d-viśvakśhiti-ravastA̱t|̍ | ajasyaikapadaH̍ pUrvE̱ prOśhThapadAH| vaiśvAqnaraM parastA̱d-vaiśvAvasava-mavastA̱t| | ahE̱rbudhniya-syOttarE|̍ aBiśhi~jcantaH̍ parastA-daBiśhuṇvantO&vastA̱t|̍ | pUśhṇO rEvatI̱| gAvaH̍ parastA̱d-vathsA avastA̱t ( )| | aśvinOraśvayujau̱|̍ grAmaH̍ parastAqthsEnAq &vastA̱t| | yamasyApaBara̍ṇIH|̍ apakaṛ śhantaH̍ parastA-dapavaha̍ntO&vastA̱t|̍ | “pUrṇA-paścAd{1}”, “yattE# dEvA adadhuH{2}”|̍ | 5 (15) 1. 5. 2 anuvAkaM 2 - karmAnuśhThAnArhaH nakśhatrarUpaH puṇyakAlaH

yat puṇyaM nakśhatram|̍ tad-baT kurvItOpavyuśham|̍ yadA vai sUrya# udEti|̍ atha nakśhatraM̍ naiti|̍ yAvati̍ tatra sUryO gacCE̱t| yatra# jaGanyaM̍ paśyE̱t| tAvati̍ kurvIta yat kAqrI syAt| puṇyAqha Eva kurutE|̍ Evaṃ ha vai yajñEśhuM̍ ca śatadyumnaM̍ ca mAqthsyO niravasAyayAM̍ cakAra|̍ | 6 (9)

yO vai nakśhatriya̍M̍ prajApatiM̍ ~MvEda|̍ uBayOrEnaM̍ ~MlOkayO̱rviduH| hasta# EvAsya hastaH|̍ citrA śiraH|̍ niśhTyAq hRudayam|̍ UrU viśAKE|̍ pratiśhThA &nUrAqdhAH|̍ Eśha vai nakśhatriya̍H̍ prajApatiH|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ uBayOrEnaM̍ ~MlOkayO̱rviduH| 7 (10)

asmiṅścAq-muśhmiṅśca|̍ | yAM kAqmayEta̍ duhitaraM̍ priyA syAqditi|̍ tAM niśhTyAyAM̍ dadyAt| priyaiva Bavati|̍ nEva tu punarAgacCati|̍ | aBijinnAma nakśhatram|̍ upariśhTA-daśhAqDhAnA̱m|̍ avastA̱cCrOṇAyai̱| dEvAqsurAH sam~MyattA̍ Asann| tE dEvAstasmin-nakśhatrE&Bya̍jayann|̍ 8 (10)

yadaByajayann|̍ tadaBijitO̍&Bijittvam|̍ yaM kAqmayEtA-napajayyaM̍ jayEditi̍|̍ tamEtasmin-nakśhatrE̍ yAtayEt| anapajayyamEva jayati|̍ pAqpaparAjitamiva̍ tu| | prajApatiH̍ paśUnasRujata|̍ tE nakśhatraM̍ nakśhatra-mupAtiśhThanta|̍ tE samAvanta̍ EvABavann|̍ tE rEvatI-mupAtiśhThanta|̍ 9 (10)

tE rEvatyAqM prABavann|̍ tasmA̱d-rEvatyA̱M paśUnAM kurvIta|̍ yat kiMcA̱rvAqcInaṃq sOmA̱t| praiva Bavanti|̍ | salilaM ~MvA idamantarAsI̱t|̍ yadatarann|̍ tat tArakAṇAM̍ tArakatvam| yO vA iha yajatE|̍ amuṃ salOkaM nakśhatE|̍ tannakśhatrAṇAM̍ nakśhatratvam| 10 (10)

dEvagRuhA vai nakśhatrAṇi|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ gRuhyEva̍ Bavati|̍ | yAni vA imAni# pRuthivyAścitrAṇi|̍ tAni nakśhatrAṇi|̍ tasmA-daślIlanA̍maṅ-ścitrE|̍ nAvasyEnna̍ yajEta|̍ yathA# pApAqhE kurutE|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| | dEvanakśhatrAṇi vA anyAni|̍ 11 (10)

yamanakśhatrAṇyanyAni|̍ kRuttikAH̍ prathamam| viśAKE̍ uttamam| tAni# dEvanakśhatrAṇi|̍ anUrAqdhAH prathamam|̍ apaBaraṇI-ruttamam|̍ tAni# yamanakśhatrAṇi|̍ yAni# dEvanakśhatrAṇi|̍ tAni dakśhiṇEna̍ pariyanti|̍ yAni# yamanakśhatrAṇi|̍ 12 (10)

tAnyuttarEṇa|̍ | anvEśhAmarAqthsmEti̍|̍ tadanUrAqdhAH|̍ jyEśhThamEśhA-mavadhiśhmEti̍|̍ tajjyE̱śhThaGnI| mUlamEśhAmavRukśhAqmEti̍|̍ tan-mUlavaṛ̍ haṇI|̍ yannAsahanta|̍ tadaśhAqDhAH|̍ yadaślOṇat|̍ 13 (10)

tacCrOṇA| yadaśRuṇOt|̍ tacCraviśhThAH|̍ yacCata-maBiśhajyann|̍ tacCataBiśhak|̍ prOśhThapadEśhUdayacCanta|̍ rEvatyAmaravanta|̍ aśvayujOrayu~jjata|̍ apaBaraṇIśhva̍ pAvahann|̍ tAni vA EtAni# yamanakśhatrAṇi# ( )| | yAnyEva dEvanakśhatrAṇi̍|̍ tEśhu# kurvIta yatkAqrI syAt| puṇyAqha Eva kurutE|̍ | 14 (13) 1. 5. 3 anuvAkaM 3 - karmAnuśhThAnArhaH divasaBAgarUpaH hEyOpAdEyakAla viBAgaH

dEvasya# savituH prAqtaH prasavaH̍ prAqṇaH| varuṇasya̍ sAqyamAsavO̍&pAqnaH|̍ | yat pratIcIna̍M̍ prAtastanA̱t| prAqcInaṃ# saMgavAt| tatO# dEvA agniśhTOmaM̍ niramimata|̍ tat-tadAttavIryaM̍ nirmAqrgaH| | mitrasya# saMgavaH| tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaH|̍ tasmAqttaṛ hi# paśavaH̍ samAyanti|̍ | yat pratIcInaṃ̍# saMgavAt| 15 (10)

prAqcInaM̍ maddhyandinAt|̍ tatO# dEvA ukthyaM̍ niramimata|̍ tat-tadAttavIryaM̍ nirmAqrgaH| | bRuhaspatE̱r maddhyandinaH|̍ tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaH|̍ tasmAqttaṛ hi tEkśhṇiśhThaM̍ tapati| | yat-pratIcIna̍M̍ maddhyandinAt|̍ prAqcIna-maparAqhṇAt|̍ tatO# dEvAH śhODaśinaM̍ niramimata|̍ tattadAttavIryaM̍ nirmAqrgaH| | 16 (10)

BagasyAparAqhṇaH|̍ tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaH|̍ tasmAdaparAqhṇE̍ kumAqryO̍# BagamicCamA̍nA-ścaranti|̍ | yat-pratIcIna̍maparAqhṇAt|̍ prAqcInaṃ# sAqyAt| tatO# dEvA atirAqtraM̍ niramimata|̍ tattadAttavIryaM̍ nirmAqrgaH| | varuṇasya̍ sAqyam| tat-puṇyaM̍ tEjasvyahaH|̍ tasmAqttaṛ hi nAnRutaM̍ ~MvadEt| | 17 (10)

brAqhmaṇO vA aśhTAviṃqśO̍ nakśhatrAṇAm|̍ samAqnasyAhnaH pa~jca puṇyAni̍ nakśhatrAṇi|̍ catvAryaślIlAni̍|̍ tAni nava|̍ yacca# parastAqnnakśhatrAṇAqM̍ ~MyaccAqvastA̱t| tAnyEkAdaśa|̍ brAqhmaṇO dvAdaśaH|̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnth saM~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvrataM carati|̍ saM~MvathsarEṇaivAsya# vrataM guptaM Bavati|̍ | samAqnasyAhnaH pa~jca puṇyAni̍ nakśhatrAṇi̍ ( )| catvAryaślIlAni̍|̍ tAni nava|̍ AqgnEyI rAtriH|̍ aindramahaH|̍ tAnyEkAdaśa|̍ AqdityO dvAdaśaH|̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnth sam~MvathsaraM̍ ~MvrataM carati|̍ sam~MvathsarEṇaivAsya# vrataM guptaM Bavati|̍ | 18 (18) 1. 5. 4 anuvAkaM 4 - sOmaśEśhaBUtA pAtrastutiH. (AdhvarabrAhmaṇaśEśhaH)

brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| kati pAtrAṇi̍ yajñaM ~MvahantIti̍|̍ trayOdaśEti̍# brUyAt| sa yadbrUyAt| kastAni niramimItEti̍|̍ prajApatiriti̍# brUyAt| sa yadbrUyAt| kutastAni niramimItEti̍|̍ Aqtmana iti|̍ prAqṇAqpAqnAByA-mEvOpAṅ̍-śvantaryAqmau̍ niramimIta|̍ 19 (10)

vyAqnAdupAṃśu̍ savanam|̍ vAqca ai̱ndravAyavam| dakśhakratuByA̱M maitrAvaruṇam| śrOtrAdAśvinam|̍ cakśhuśhaH̍ śukrA manthinau̱| Aqtmana# Agrayaṇam| a~ggE̱Bya ukthya̱m| AyuśhO̍ dhruvam| pratiśhThAyA# RutupAqtrE| | yajñaM ~MvAva taM prajApatir̍ niramimIta̍ ( )| sa nirmitO̍ nAddhriyata̍ samavlIyata|̍ sa EtAn prajApati-rapivAqpAna̍-paśyat|̍ tAnniravapat|̍ tairvai sa yajñamapyavapat|̍ yadapivAqpA̍ Bavanti|̍ yajñasya dhRutyAq asam~MvlayAya|̍ | 20 (16) (upAqṅqśvantaryAqmau niramimItA-̍ mimIta śhaT ca)̍ (A4) 1. 5. 5 anuvAkaM 5 - cAturmAsyaśEśhA vapanamantrAH, (rAjasUyabrAhmaṇam)

RutamEva paramEśhThi|̍ RutaM nAtyEti̍ kiM cana| RutE samudra̍ AhitaH|̍ RutE BUmiriyaṅ̍ śritA| agnistigmEna# śOciśhA̱| tapa AkrA̱nta-muśhṇihA̱| śirastapasyAhitam|̍ vaiśvAqnarasya tEjasA|̍ RutEnA̱sya nivartayE|̍ satyEna parivartayE|̍ 21 (10)

tapasAq&syAnu̍vartayE|̍ śivEnAqsyOpavartayE|̍ śagmEnA̱syAq-BivartayE|̍ tadRutaM tath satyam| tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|̍ tEna# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam| | yad-GarmaH paryavartayat|̍ antA̱n pRuthivyA divaH| agnirIśAna̍ OjasA|̍ varuṇO̍ dhItiBiH̍ saha| 22 (10)

indrO# marudBiH saKiBiH̍ saha| | agnistigmEna# śOciśhA̱| tapa AkrA̱nta-muśhṇihA̱| śirastapasyAhitam|̍ vaiśvAqnarasya tEjasA|̍ RutEnA̱sya nivartayE|̍ satyEna parivartayE|̍ tapasAq̍ &syAnuvartayE|̍ śivEnAqsyOpavartayE|̍ śagmEnA̱syAqBivartayE|̍ 23 (10)

tadRutaM tath satyam| tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|̍ tEna# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam| | yO asyAH pRuthivyAstvaci|̍ nivartayatyOśhadhIH|̍ agnirIśAna̍ OjasA|̍ varuṇO̍ dhItiBiH̍ saha| indrO# marudBiH saKiBiH̍ saha| | agnistigmEna# śOciśhA̱| tapa AkrA̱nta-muśhṇihA̱| 24 (10)

śirastapasyAhitam|̍ vaiśvAqnarasya tEjasA|̍ RutEnA̱sya nivartayE|̍ satyEna parivartayE|̍ tapasAq̍ &syAnuvartayE|̍ śivEnAqsyOpavartayE|̍ śagmEnA̱syAq-BivartayE|̍ tadRutaM tath satyam| tad-vataM tacCakEyam|̍ tEna# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam| | 25 (10)

EkaM mAsa-mudasRujat|̍ paramEśhThI prajAByaH|̍ tEnA̱ByO maha Avahat|̍ amRutaM martyA̱ByaH| prajAmanu prajAyasE|̍ tadu# tE martyAqmRuta̱m| yEna mAsA# arddhamAqsAH| RutavaH̍ parivathsarAH| yEna tE tE̱ prajApatE| IjAqnasya nyavartayann|̍ 26 (10)

tEnAqhamasya brahmaṇA|̍ nivartayAmi̍ jIvasE̱| | agnistigmEna# śOciśhA̱| tapa AkrA̱nta-muśhṇihA̱| śirastapasyAhitam|̍ vaiśvAqnarasya tEjasA|̍ RutEnA̱sya nivartayE|̍ satyEna parivartayE|̍ tapasAq̍ &syAnuvartayE|̍ śivEnAqsyOpavartayE̍ ( )| śagmEnA̱syAqBivartayE|̍ tadRutaM tath-satyam| tad-vrataM tacCakEyam|̍ tEna# śakEyaM tEna# rAddhyAsam| | 27 (14) 1. 5. 6 anuvAkaM 6 - cAturmAsyaśEśhA vapanavidhi: (rAjasUyabrAhmaṇam)

dEvA vai yad-yajñE &kurvata|̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata| tE&surA̍ UrddhvaM pRuśhThEByO nApaśyann|̍ tE kEśAqnagrE&vapanta|̍ atha śmaśrUṇi|̍ athOpapakśhau|̍ tatastE&vA̱~jca Ayann| parA&Bavann|̍ yasyaivaM ~Mvapanti|̍ avA~gEti|̍ 28 (10)

athO paraiva Bavati|̍ atha# dEvA UrddhvaM pRuśhThEByO&paśyann|̍ ta upapakśhAvagrE̍&vapanta|̍ atha śmaśrUṇi|̍ atha kEśAn|̍ tatastE&Bavann|̍ suvargaM ~MlOkamAyann|̍ yasyaivaM ~Mvapanti|̍ BavatyAqtmanA̱|̍ athO# suvargaM ~MlOkamEti|̍ | 29 (10)

athaitan-manur-vaptrE̍ mithuna-ma̍paśyat|̍ sa śmaśrUṇyagrE&vapata|̍ athOpapakśhau|̍ atha kEśAn|̍ tatO vai sa prAjAyata̍ prajayA# paśuBiH|̍ yasyaivaM ~Mvapanti|̍ pra prajayA# paśuBir-mithunair̍ jAyatE|̍ | dEvAqsurAH sam~MyattA̍ Asann| tE sam~MvathsarE̍ vyAyacCanta|̍ tAn dEvAścAtur-mAqsyairEvABi̍ prAyu~jjata|̍ 30 (10)

vaiśvadEvEna# caturO# mAqsO&vRu~jjatEndra̍rAjAnaH|̍ tA~jCIrq. śhanni cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca| varuṇa praGAqsai-ścaturO# mAqsO&vRu~jjata̍ varuṇarAjAnaH|̍ tA~jCIrq. śhanni cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca| sAqkamEdhaiścaturO# mAqsO&vRu~jjata̍ sOmarAjAnaH|̍ tA~jCIra. śhanni cAvartayanta̍ pari# ca| yA sam~Mvathsara̍ upajIvA̍ &&sI̱t| tAmEśhA-mavRu~jjata|̍ tatO# dEvA aBavann|̍ parA&surAH|̍ 31 (10)

ya EvaM ~MvidvAṅ-ścAturmAqsyair-yaja̍tE|̍ BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ mAqsO vRuktvA| śIrq. śhanni ca# vartayatE̍ pari# ca| yaiśhA sam~Mvathsara̍ upajIvA|̍ vRu~gktE tAM BrAtRuvyasya|̍ kśhudhA &sya BrAtRuvyaH̍ parA# Bavati| | lOhitAqyasEna nivartayatE|̍ yadvA imAmagniṛ RutAvAgatE̍ nivartayati|̍ EtadEvainAṃ# rUpaM kRutvA nivartayati|̍ sA tataH śvaH śvO BUyasI̍ BavantyEti|̍ 32 (10)

prajAyatE|̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvA~MllOhitAyasEna̍# nivartayatE|̍ EtadEva rUpaM kRutvA nivartayatE|̍ sa tataH śvaH śvO BUyAqn-BavannEti|̍ praiva jAyatE|̍ | trEṇyA śalalyA̍ nivartayEta|̍ trIṇi# trIṇi vai dEvAnAmRuddhAni̍|̍ trIṇi CandAṃsi|̍ trIṇi savanAni|̍ traya# imE lOkAH| 33 (10)

RuddhyAmEva tad-vIrya# Eśhu lOkEśhu prati# tiśhThati| | yaccAturmAsyayAq-jyA̱tmanO̍ nAvadyEt| dEvEBya AvRuścyEta|̍ catRuśhu catRuśhu̍ mAsEśhu̍ nivartayEta|̍ parOkśhamEva̍ tad-dEvEBya# AqtmanO&vadyatyanA̱̍ vraskAya| | dEvAnAqM ~MvA Eśha AnItaH|̍ yaścAturmAsyayAqjI|̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnni ca# vartayatE̍ pari# ca| dEvatA# EvApyEti|̍ nAsya# rudraH prajAM paśU-naBimanyatE̍ ( )| | 34 (10) 1. 5. 7 anuvAkaM 7 - agnicayanaśEśhA iśhTakOpadhAnamantrAH, tatra saMtatyAKyEśhTakAmantrAH

AyuśhaH̍ prAqṇaṃ santanu|̍ prAqṇAdapAqnaṃ̍ santanu|̍ apAqnAd vyAqnaṃ santanu|̍ vyAqnAccakśhuH santanu|̍ cakśhuśhaH̍ śrOtraṃq santanu|̍ śrOtrAqn manaH santanu|̍ manasO̍ vAcaṃq santanu|̍ vAqca AqtmAnaṃq santanu|̍ AqtmanaH̍ pRuthivIṃ santanu|̍ pRuthivyA antarikśhaṃq̍ santanu̍ ( )| antarikśhAqd-divaṃq̍ santanu|̍ divaH suvaH santanu|̍ | 35 (12) (antarikśhaṃq̍ santanu̍ dvE ca)̍ (A7) 1. 5. 8 anuvAkaM 8 - agnicayanaśEśhA tharvaśirO&BidhAnAnAmiśhTakAnAM mantrAH

indrO# dadhIcO asthaBiH|̍ vRutrAṇya pratiśhkutaH|̍ jaGAna# nava tIrnava|̍ | icCannaśvasya̍ yacCiraH|̍ parvatEśhvapa̍# śritam| tad-vidacCaryaṇAva̍ti|̍ | atrA ha qgOramanvata|̍ nAma tvaśhTurapIcya̱m|̍ itthA candramasO̍ gRuhE| | indramidgAqthinO# bRuhat| 36 (10)

indramarkEBi̍rarkiṇa̍H|̍ indraM ~MvAṇIranUśhata|̍ | indra iddharyOH sacA̱| saMmiśla̍ AvacO̍ yujA̱| indrO# vajrI hiraṇyaya̍H|̍ | indrO# dIrGAya cakśhasE|̍ A sUryaṃ# rOhayad-divi| vi gOBiradrimairayat|̍ | indra vAjEśhu̍ nO ava| sahasra# pradhanEśhu ca| 37 (10)

ugra ugrABirUtiBi̍H|̍ | tamindraM̍ ~MvAjayAmasi| mahE vRutrAya hantavE|̍ sa vRuśhA# vRuśhaBO Buvat|̍ | indraH sadAmanE̍ kRutaH| OjiśhThaH̍ sa balE# hitaH| dyumnI ślOkI sa saumyaH|̍ | girA vajrO na saMBRutaH|̍ sabalO̍ anapacyutaH|̍ vavakśhu-rugrO astRutaH̍ ( )| | 38 (10) 1. 5. 9 anuvAkaM 9 - sOmaśEśhaBUtA iśhTayaH. (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

dEvAqsurAH sam~MyattA̍ Asann| sa prajApatirindra̍M̍ jyEśhThaM putramapa nyadhatta|̍ nEdEnamasu̍rAq̍ balIyAṃ̍ sO&hananniti|̍ prahrAdO# ha vai kAyAdhavaH|̍ virOcanaṅq̍ svaM putramapa nyadhatta|̍ nEdEnaM̍ dEvA ahananniti̍|̍ tE dEvAH prajApati-mupasamEtyO̍cuH|̍ nArAqjakasya̍ yuddhamasti|̍ indramanvicCAqmEti̍|̍ taM ~MyajñakratuBi-ranvai̱cCann|̍ 39 (10)

taM ~MyajñakratuBirnAnva̍vindann|̍ tamiśhTiBi-ranvai̱cCann|̍ tamiśhTiBi-ranva̍vindann|̍ tadiśhTInA-miśhTitvam|̍ EśhTayO̍ ha vai nAma|̍ tA iśhTaya̍ ityAcakśhatE̍ parOkśhEṇa|̍ parOkśhapriyA̍ iva hi dEvAH| | tasmA# EtamA̱gnAvaiśhṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ dIkśhaṇIyaM niravapann|̍ tadapadrutyA̍tanvata|̍ tAnpatnI̍ sam~MyAqjAnta upAnayann|̍ 40 (10)

tE tadaM̍ tamEva kRutvOdadravann|̍ | tE prAyaṇIya̍maBi̍ samArOhann|̍ tadapadrutyA̍tanvata|̍ tA~jCam~Myvanta̍ upAnayann|̍ tE tadataMmEva̍ kRutvOdadravann|̍ | ta AtithyamaBi̍ samArOhann|̍ tadapadrutyA̍tanvata|̍ tAniDA̱nta upAnayann|̍ tE tadataMmEva̍ kRutvOdadravann|̍ tasmA# dEtA EtadantAq̍ iśhTayaH̍ saMtiśhThantE|̍ | 41(10)

Evaṃ hi dEvA akurvata|̍ iti# dEvA akurvata|̍ ityu vai manuśhyA̱H̍ kurvatE| | tE dEvA UcuH|̍ yadvA idamuccair-yajñEna carAma|̍ tannO&surAH̍ pAqpmA&nuvindanti|̍ upAqṃqśUpasadA̍# carAma| tathAq nO&surAH̍ pAqpmA nAnuvEthsyantIti̍|̍ ta upAqṃqśU̍pasada̍-matanvata|̍ tisra Eva sAmidhEnIranUcya̍|̍ 42 (10)

sruvEṇAGAqra-mAqGArya̍|̍ tisraH parAcI-rAhu̍tIṛ̍ hutvA| sruvEṇOpasada̍M̍ juhavA~jcakruH|̍ ugraM ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEśhaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhEti|̍ aśanayAqpipAqsE ha vA ugraM ~MvacaH|̍ Enaśca̍ vairahatyaM̍ ca tvEśhaM ~MvacaH|̍ Etaṃ ha vAva taccaturddhAvihitaM̍ pAqpmAnaM̍ dEvA apajaGnirE|̍ | tathO# EvaitadEvaM̍ ~MvidyajamAnaH|̍ tisra Eva sAmidhEnIranUcya̍|̍ sruvEṇAGAqra-mAqGArya̍|̍ 43 (10)

tisraH parAcIrAhu̍tIṛ̍ hutvA| sruvEṇOpasada̍M̍ juhOti| ugraM ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEśhaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhEti|̍ aśanayAqpipAqsE ha vA ugraM ~MvacaH|̍ Enaśca̍ vairahatyaM̍ ca tvEśhaM ~MvacaH|̍ EtamEva taccaturddhA-vihitaM̍ pAqpmAnaM ~MyajamAqnO&pa̍hatE|̍ | tE&BinIyaivAha̍H̍ paśumA-&laBanta|̍ ahna# Eva tad-dEvA avartiM̍ pAqpmAnaM̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE|̍ tEnABinIyE̍va̍ rAtrEH prAcarann|̍ rAtriyA̍ Eva tad-dEvA avartiM̍ pAqpmAnaM̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE|̍ | 44 (10)

tasmAdaBinIyaivAha̍H̍ paśumAlaBEta|̍ ahna# Eva tad-yajamAqnO̍ &vartiM̍ pAqpmAnaM BrAtRuvyAqnapa̍nudatE|̍ tEnABinIyE̍va̍ rAtrEH pracarEt|̍ rAtriyA̍ Eva tad-yajamAqnO̍ &vartiM̍ pAqpmAnaM BrAtRuvyAqnapa̍nudatE|̍ | sa Eśha upavasathIyE̍ &han-dvidEvatya̍H̍ paśurAlaByatE|̍ dvayaM ~MvA asmin ~MlOkE yajamAnaH|̍ asthi# ca mAqṃqsaM ca|̍ asthi# caiva tEna# mAqṃqsaM ca yajamAnaH̍ saṅ skurutE|̍ | tA vA EtAH pa~jca# dEvatA̱H| agnIśhOmA-vagnir-mitrAvaru̍ṇau̍ ( )| 45 (10)

pa~jcapa~jcI vai yajamAnaH|̍ tva~gmAqṃq saṅ snAvAsthi# majjA| EtamEva tatpa~jcadhA̍ vihitamAqtmAnaM̍ ~MvaruṇapAqśAn-mu~jcati|̍ BEśhajatAyai̍ nirvaruṇatvAya|̍ | taṃ saptaBiH CandOBiH̍ prAqtarahvayann|̍ tasmA̱thsapta caturuttarAṇi̍ CandAṃsi̍ prAtaranuvAqkE&nU̱cyantE| | tamEtayO-pasamEtyO-pA̍sIdann|̍ upA̱smai gAyatA nara iti|̍ tasmA# dEtayA# bahiśhpavamAqna upasadya̍H|̍ | 46 (9) (aicCan - nanayaṅq - stiśhThantE - &nUcyAq - nUcya# sruvEṇAGAqramAqGArya̍ - rAtriyA̍ Eva tad dEvA avartiM̍ pAqpmAnaM# mRutyumapajaGnirE̍ - mitrAvaruṇau̍ - +nava# ca ) (A9) śpecial kOrvai (dEvA yajamAnO̍ dEvA dEvA yajamAnO̍ yajamAnO&laBanta̍ prAcara~MllaBEta̍ pracarEdAla̍BantAla̍BEta̍ mRutyumapajaGnirE̍ BrAtRuvyAn)̍ 1. 5. 10 anuvAkaM 10 - trivRudAdistOmarUpAṇi sOma~ggAni. (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

sa samudra̍ uttarataH̍ prAjvalad-BUmyantEna̍|̍ Eśha vAva sa samudraH|̍ yaccAtvAlaH|̍ Eśha u# vEva sa BU̱myantaH| yadvE̱dyantaH| tadEtat-triśalaM̍ tripUruśham|̍ tasmAqt-taM trivitastaM̍ Kananti|̍ | sa suvarṇarajatAByA̱M̍ kuśIByAqM parigRuhIta̍ AsIt| taM ~MyadasyA addhyajanayann|̍ tasmAdAdityaH|̍ 47 (10)

atha yath suvarṇarajatAByA̱M̍ kuśIByAqM parigRuhIta̍ AsI̱t| sA&sya# kauśikatA̱| | taM trivRutAq&Bi prAstuvata|̍ taM trivRutA &&dadata|̍ taM trivRutA &&harann|̍ yAvatI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱| | taM pa~jcadaśEnAqBi̍ prAstuvata|̍ taM pa~jcadaśEnAda̍data|̍ taM pa~jcadaśEnAha̍rann|̍ yAvatI̍ pa~jcadaśasya mAtrA̱| 48 (10)

taṃ saptadaśEnAqBi̍ prAstuvata|̍ taṃ saptadaśEnAda̍data|̍ taṃ saptadaśEnAha̍rann|̍ yAvatI̍ saptadaśasya mAtrA̱| tasya# saptadaśEna# hriyamAṇasya̍ tEjO harO&patat|̍ tamEkaviṃq̍ śEnAqBi prAstuvata|̍ tamEkaviṃqśEnAda̍data|̍ tamEkaviṃqśEnAha̍rann|̍ yAvatyEkaviṃqśasya̍ mAtrA̱| | tE yat-trivRutA̱ stuvatE̱| 49 (10)

trivRutaiva tad-yajamAnamAda̍datE|̍ taM trivRutaiva haranti|̍ yAvatI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱| agnirvai trivRut| yAvadvA agnErdahatO̍ dhUma udEtyAnuvyEti|̍ tAvatI̍ trivRutO mAtrA̱| agnErEvainaM tat| mAtrAqṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti| | atha yatpa~jcadaśEna̍# stuvatE̱| pa~jcadaśEnaiva tad-yajamAna-mAda̍datE|̍ 50 (10)

taM pa~jcadaśEnaiva̍ haranti|̍ yAvatI̍ pa~jcadaśasya mAtrA̱| candramAq vai pa~jcadaśaH|̍ Eśha hi pa~jcadaśyAma̍pakśhIyatE̱|̍ pa~jcadaśyA-mApUryatE̱|̍ candramasa̍ EvainaM tat| mAtrAqṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti| atha yathsaptadaśEna̍# stuvatE̱| saptadaśEnaiva tad-yajamAnamAda̍datE|̍ taṃ saptadaśEnaiva̍ haranti|̍ 51 (10)

yAvatI̍ saptadaśasya mAtrA̱| prajApatirvai̍ saptadaśaH|̍ prajApatErEvainaM̍ tat| mAtrAqṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti| atha yadEkaviṃqśEna̍# stuvatE̱| EkaviṃqśEnaiva tad-yajamAna-mAda̍datE|̍ tamEkaviṃqśEnaiva̍ haranti|̍ yAvatyEkaviṃqśasya̍ mAtrA̱| asau vA Aditya̍ EkaviṃqśaH|̍ AqdityasyaivainaM tat| 52 (10)

mAtrAqṃq sAyujyaṃ̍ salOkatA̱M gamayanti| | tE kuśyau̱| vyaGnann|̍ tE ahOrAqtrE̍ aBavatAm|̍ aharEva̍ suvarṇA# &Bavat| rajatA rAtriH|̍ sa yadAditya̍ udEti|̍ EtAmEva tathsuvarṇA̱M kuśImanu samEti|̍ atha yadastamEti̍|̍ EtAmEva tad-rajatAM̍ kuśImanu sam~Mviśati̍ ( )| | prahrAdO# ha vai kAyAdhavaH|̍ virOcanaṅq̍ svaM putramudA̱syat| sa pradarO̍&Bavat|̍ tasmA̱t pradarAdudakaM̍ nAcAmEt|̍ | 53 (14) 1. 5. 11 anuvAkaM 11 - savanIyapaśupurODAśAH (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

yE vai catvAraH stOmA̱H| kRutaM tat| atha yE pa~jca|̍ kaliH saH| tasmAqccatuśhTOmaH|̍ taccatuśhTOmasya̍ catuśhTOmatvam| | tadAhuH|̍ katamAni tAni jyOtIṃśhi|̍ ya Etasya stOmAq iti|̍ trivRut-pa~jcadaśaH̍ saptadaśa̍ EkaviṃqśaH|̍ 54 (10)

EtAni vAva tAni jyOtIṃśhi|̍ ya Etasya stOmA̱H| | sO̱&bravIt| saptadaśEna# hriyamAṇO̍ vyalEśiśhi|̍ Biśhajyata̍ mEti|̍ tamaśvinau# dhAqnABi-raBiśhajyatAm|̍ pUśhA karamBEṇa̍|̍ BAratI̍ parivAqpEṇa|̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ payasyayA|̍ | tadAhuH|̍ 55 (10)

yadaśviByA̱M dhAqnAH| pUśhṇaH karamBaH|̍ BAratyai̍ parivAqpaH| mitrAvaruṇayOH̍ payasyA&tha|̍ kasmAdEtEśhAṃ̍# haviśhAqmindramEva̍ yajantIti̍|̍ EtA hyEnaM̍ dEvatAq iti# brUyAt| Etaiṛ havirBi-raBiśhajyaṅq-stasmAqditi̍|̍ | taM ~MvasavO&śhTAka̍pAlEna̍ prAtassavanE&Biśhajyann|̍ rudrA EkAdaśakapAlEna̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|̍ viśvE# dEvA dvAdaśakapAlEna̍ tRutIyasavanE| | 56 (10)

sa yadaśhTAkapAlAn̍ prAtassavanE kuryAt| EkAdaśakapAlAqn̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|̍ dvAdaśakapAlAṅ̍ stRutIya savanE| vilOma̍ tad-yajñasya# kriyEta| EkAdaśakapAlAnEva̍ prAtassavanE̍ kuryAt|̍ EkAdaśakapAlAqn̍ mAddhyandinE̍ savanE|̍ EkAdaśakapAlAṅ̍ stRutIya savanE| yajñasya# salOmatvAya|̍ | tadAhuH|̍ yad vasUnAM̍ prAtassavanam ( )| rudrAṇAqM mAddhyandinaṃq̍ savanam|̍ viśvEśhAM̍ dEvAnA̱M tRutIyasavanam| atha kasmAdEtEśhAṃ̍# haviśhAqmindramEva̍ yajantIti̍|̍ EtA hyEnaM̍ dEvatAq iti# brUyAt| Etaiṛ havirBiraBiśhajyaṅq̍ stasmAqditi|̍ | 57 (15) (Ekaviṃqśa-Ahu-stRutIyasavanE-prA̍tassavanaM̍ pa~jca# ca) (A11) 1. 5. 12 anuvAkaM 12 - saptaCandAMsi prapa~jcyantE (AdhvarabrAhmaṇam)

tasyAvAcO&vapAqdAda̍biBayuH|̍ tamEtEśhu# saptasu CandaH̍ svaśrayann| yadaśrayann|̍ tacCrAyantIya̍sya̍ śrAyantIyatvam| yadavArayann|̍ tad vAravantIya̍sya̍ vAravantIyatvam| | tasyAvAca̍ EvAvapAqdAda̍biBayuH|̍ tasmA# EtAni# sapta caturuttarAṇi̍ CandAqṅqsyupAdadhuH|̍ tEśhAqmati trIṇyaricyanta|̍ na trIṇyudaBavann|̍ 58 (10)

sa bRuhatImEvA-spRu̍śat|̍ dvAByAmakśharA̱ByAm|̍ ahOrAqtrAByAmEva|̍ | tadAhuH|̍ katamA sA dEvAkśharA̍ bRuhatI| yasyAqM tat pratyatiśhThat|̍ dvAdaśa̍ paurṇamAqsyaH|̍ dvAdaśAśhTakAH|̍ dvAdaśAmAvAqsyA̱H|̍ EśhA vAva sA dEvAkśharA̍ bRuhatI| 59 (10)

yasyAqM tat pratyatiśhThaditi̍|̍ | yAni# ca CandAṅ-syatyari̍cyanta|̍ yAni# ca nOdaBavann|̍ tAni nirvI̱ryAṇi hInAnyamanyanta|̍ sA &bravId-bRuhatI|̍ mAmEva BUtvA| mAmupa saṅ śrayatEti̍|̍ caturBirakśharai̍-ranuśhTug-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|̍ caturBirakśharai̱H̍ pa~gktir-bRuhatI-matya̍ricyata|̍ tasyAmEtAni̍# catvAryakśharA̱ṇya-pacCidyA-dadhAt|̍ 60 (10)

tE bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA| bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm|̍ | aśhTAqBi-rakśharairuśhṇig-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|̍ aśhTAqBirakśharai̱striśhTug-bRuhatI-matya̍ricyata|̍ tasyAmEtA-nyaśhTAvakśharA̱ṇya-pacCidyA̍dadhAt|̍ tE bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA| bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm|̍ dvAqdaśaBi-rakśharai̱r-gAyatrI-bRu̍hatIM̍ nOdaBavat|̍ dvAqdaśaBi-rakśharair-jaga̍tI-bRuhatI-matya̍ricyata|̍ tasyAmEtAni̍ dvAdaśAqkśharA̱ṇya-pacCidyA̍dadhAt|̍ 61 (10)

tE bRuhatI̍ Eva BUtvA| bRuhatImupa samaśrayatAm|̍ | sO̱&bravIt-prajApatiH|̍ CandAṃsi̍ rathO# mE Bavata| yuśhmABi-rahamEta-maddhvA̍namanu̍ saMcarAqṇIti̍|̍ tasya# gAyatrI ca jagatI̍ ca pakśhAvaBavatAm|̍ uśhṇikca# triśhTupca praśhTyau̱| anuśhTupca# pa~gktiśca dhuryau̱| bRuhatyEvOddhira̍Bavat|̍ sa EtaM CandOrathamAqsthAya̍# ( )| EtamaddhvAnamanu̍ samacarat|̍ Etaṃ ha vai CandOrathamAqsthAya̍|̍ EtamaddhvAnamanu̍ saMcarati|̍ yEnaiśha Etath sacaMrati|̍ ya EvaM ~MvidvAnth-sOmEna̍ yajatE|̍ ya ucainamEvaM̍ ~MvEda|̍ | 62 (16) prapAtaka kOrvai with starting words of 1 tO 12 anuvAkams :- (agnEH kRuttikAq̍ - yat puṇyaM̍ - dEvasya# savitur - brahmavAqdinaH̍ ka - tyRutamEva - dEvA vA - AyuśhaH̍ prAqṇa - mindrO# dadhIcO -dEvAsurAH̍ sa prajApatiH̍ - sa samudrO̍ - yE vai catvAra - stasyAvAcO̍ dvAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting words of 1, 11, 21 series of dasinis :- (agnEH kRuttikA̍ - dEvagRuhA - RutamEva - vai̱śvadEvEna - tE tadanta̍ - taM pa~jcadaśEna̍ - tE bRuhatI̍ Eva dviśhaśhTiH)̍ first and last word of 5th prapAtakam :- (agnEH kRuttikAq̍ - ya u cainamEvaM̍ ~MvEda)|̍ | hariH̍ OM| | | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaṇE prathamAśhTakE pa~jcamaH prapAThakaH samAptaH| APPEṇDIX FOR 1. 5. 1. 5

“pUrṇA-paścAd{1}”, “yattE# dEvA adadhuH{2}”̍ pUrṇA paścAduta pUrṇA purastAqdunmadhyataH̍ pau̱rṇamAqsI jigAya|̍ tasyA̱n dEvA adhi# saM~Mvasanta̍ uttamE nAka# iha mAdayantAM|̍ | yattE# dEvA adadhu̍ rBAgadhEyamamAvAsyE̍ saM~MvasantO̍ mahitvA| sAnO# yajñaM pipRuhi̍ viśvavArE rayiM nO# dhEhi suBagE suvIra̱M| | (Appearing in Tś 3. 5. 1. 1) =================== OM namaH paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaH śrI guruByO namaH, hariH OM 1. 6 prathamAśhTakE śhaśhThaH prapAThakaH - rAjasUyAnubrAhmaṇaM 1. 6. 1 anuvAkaM 1 - anumatyAdyA iśhTayaH

anumatyai̍ purODAśa-maśhTAka̍pAlaM̍ nirvapati|̍ yE pratya~jcaH śamyAyA̍ avaśIyantE|̍ tannaiṛ Ruta-mEka̍kapAlam|̍ iyaM ~MvA anumatiH|̍ iyaM niṛ RutiH|̍ naiṛ qRutEna pUrvEṇa̍ pracarati|̍ pAqpmAnamEva̍ niṛ RutiM̍ pUrvA̱M niravadayatE|̍ Eka# kapAlO Bavati| Ekadhaiva niṛ RutiM̍ niravadayatE|̍ yadahutvAq̍ gAṛ hapatya̍ IyuH| 1 (10)

rudrO BUtvA&gniranUtthAya̍|̍ addhvaryuM ca yajamAnaM̍ ca hanyAt| vIhi svAhA &&hutiM̍ juśhAqṇa ityAha|̍ Ahutyaivainaṃ̍# śamayati| nArtimArcCa-tyaddhvaryurna̍ yajamAnaH|̍ EkOlmukEna# yanti| taddhi niṛ Rutyai̍ BAgadhEya̱m| imAM diśaM̍ ~Myanti| EśhA vai niṛ Rutyai̍ dik| svAyAmEva̍ diśi niṛ RutiM̍ niravadayatE|̍ 2 (10)

svakRuta̍ iriṇE̍ juhOti pradarE vA̱| Etadvai niṛ RutyA̍ Aqyatanam|̍ sva EvAyatanE̍ niṛ RutiM̍ niravadayatE|̍ Eśha tE# niṛ RutE BAqga ityAha|̍ nirdiśatyEvainA̱m|̍ BUtE# haviśhmatyasItyA̍ha|̍ BUtimEvOpAva̍rtatE|̍ mu~jcEmamaṃhasa̍ ityAha|̍ aṃhasa̍ EvainaM̍ mu~jcati| a~gguśhThAByA̱M juhOti| 3 (10)

antata Eva niṛ RutiM̍ niravadayatE|̍ kRuśhṇaM ~MvAsaH̍ kRuśhṇatUśhaM̍ dakśhiṇA|̍ Etad-vai niṛ Rutyai̍ rUpam| rUpEṇaiva niṛ RutiM̍ niravadayatE|̍ apratIkśhamAya̍nti|̍ niṛ RutyA̍ antaṛ hityai|̍ svAhAq namO ya idaM cakArEti punarEtya gAṛ hapatyE̍ juhOti| Ahutyaiva̍ namasyantO̍ gAṛ hapatya-mupAva̍rtantE|̍ AqnumatEna pracarati|̍ iyaM ~MvA anumatiH|̍ 4 (10)

iyamEvAsmai# rAqjyamanumanyatE|̍ dhEnur-dakśhiṇA|̍ imAmEva dhEnuM kurutE|̍ AqdityaM caruM nirvapati|̍ uBayI̱śhvEva prajAsvaBiśhicyatE|̍ daivIśhu̍ ca mAnuśhIśhu̍ ca| varO dakśhiṇA|̍ varO hi rAqjyaṃ samRuddhyai|̍ AqgnAqvaiśhṇava-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|̍ agniH sarvA# dEvatA̱H| 5 (10)

viśhṇuryajñaH|̍ dEvatA̱ścaiva yajñaM cAva# rundhE| vAqmanO vahI dakśhiṇA|̍ yad-vahI| tEnA̱gnEyaH| yad-vAmanaH|̍ tEna# vaiśhṇavaH samRuddhyai|̍ agnIśhOmIya-mEkAdaśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|̍ agnIśhOmA̱ByAqM ~MvA indrO# vRutramahanniti̍|̍ yadagnIśhOmIya-mEkA̍daśakapAlaM̍ nirvapati|̍ 6 (10)
